mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT roleid AS dictvalue, rolename AS dictlabel, (case when rolekey = 'common' then 'Y' else 'N' end) as isdefault, orderBy FROM ( SELECT t.*, 'role' AS dict_type FROM m_role t ) AS m_role WHERE dict_type = #{dictType} AND valid = '1' UNION ALL SELECT dict_value AS dictvalue, dict_label AS dictlabel, is_default as isdefault, dict_sort as orderBy FROM sys_dict_data WHERE dict_type = #{dictType} AND valid = '1' ) aa ORDER BY orderBy

SELECT 'true' AS basic, dict_label AS NAME, '' AS singer, '' AS img, '' AS src, '' AS lrc, '' AS time FROM sys_dict_data WHERE dict_type = 'web_music_gedan' and dict_value = #{gedan} AND valid = '1' union all SELECT 'false' AS basic, musicName AS NAME, singer, ( SELECT fileUrl FROM sys_music_file WHERE musicId = t.musicId AND fileType = 'image' AND valid = '1' ) AS img, ( SELECT fileUrl FROM sys_music_file WHERE musicId = t.musicId AND fileType = 'audio' AND valid = '1' ) AS src, lyrics AS lrc, length AS time FROM sys_music AS t where valid = '1' and gedan = #{gedan}

SELECT columnId AS id, columnName AS menuName, columnIcon AS icon, columnUrl AS menuUrl, isDefault FROM sys_column WHERE isHidden = '0'
and parentId = #{columnId}
and parentId = '0'
order by orderBy
